text: Bottle, 750 ml, shared with Miro and JFK10000. Pours black with medium frothy off-white head. Malty, roasted, chocolate, bread. Light sweet and acidic with dry bitter finish. Average carbonation. Medium bodied.

Bottle at Illegal Beer, Prague. Poured a clear dark brown colour with a thin broken light tan head. The aroma is sweet roasty malt, light creamy caramel. The flavour is moderate sweet with a rich, slightly oily, smoky liquorice, sweet toffee fudge palate. Medium bodied with soft carbonation. Very impressive.

On tap. Pours dark brown with small tan head. Aroma of roasted malt, chocolate, coffee, something sour. Light body with soft carbonation. Taste is light sweet, medium bitter, light sour with dry finish.

UPDATED: APR 13, 2017 Cask @ Beergeek Bar, Prague. 13 Plato&5,3%ABV. Pours black, no real head just light traces of foam. Aroma of roasted malt, coffee, caramel, dark chocolate, cocoa. Flavor is light sweet, light bitter, malty, caramel, wood, chocolate, little licorice. Medium body, soft carbonation, dry finish. 130417

Bottle @ Home. Pours black with a creamy tan head, lacings. Aroma of roasted malt, toasted bread, little caramel, light chocolate. Flavor is light sour, malt, toasted, bread, hints of chocolate, lemonlike notes. Thin to medium body, soft to average carbonation, dry and light acidic finish. 250916
UPDATED: SEP 10, 2016 On tap. Dark chestnut color, tan head. Aroma of coffee, chocolate, tin of lemon. Taste is medium bitter, light sweet, light sour, but also a bit watery. Good one.

Draught at Taphouse.
Black colored with a small beige head.
Roasted aroma of hay and chocolate.
Roasted flavor of hay, chocolate and violets.
Roasted finish.

From tap. Pours dark brown with a small tan head. Aroma is roasted dark malty and breadish. Dry, roasted, chocolate and malty. Medium dry. Toasted and breadish to chocolate malty. Dry and toasted finish.
Draft. A black beer with a dark brown head. The aroma has notes of roasted malt, bread, and caramel. The flavor is sweet with notes of roasted malt, bread, and caramel, leading to a bitter finish.
From tap at Taphouse. Black with a small beige head. Aroma and flavour of caramel, malt, coffee and a dry finish.

Sweet and roasted malty, some cocoa, light charred notes, dry earthy finish.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
Praená vůně, kávová. V chutí kávové, sladové, příjemně hořké. Nikterak sladké pivko. Tmavé nemusím, ale tohle je fajn.

(bottle) black in colour with a frothy beige head. aroma of brown sugar and toasted malts, with lots of vanilla extract, some sugar icing and cornflakes. flavour is mostly the same, lots of roasted malts and brown sugar, with a touch of grass, some apricots, dark chocolate and a semi-dry finish. medium-bodied with soft carbonation.
Bottle from 100 piv. Dark chestnut brown color with huge beige head. Roasted malt, coffe, dark chocolate. Taste, dark chocolate, roasted malt, caramel. Long coffee bitter finish. Very good.
On tap at Illegal pub, Prague. Pours brown color, beige head. Aroma of coffee, chocolate. Taste is medium sweet, medium bitter, coffee, roasted malt, dark chocolate.
Bottle. Dark brown - black color with beige head. Aroma - Coffee, roasted malts, plums. Taste - Bitter, dark choc, dark fruit and other dark things. Good.

On tap, Le Senk. Dark brown/ black colour. Stable beige head. Aroma roasted, coffee, espresso a bit toffee, some earthy hopiness. Taste is dry roasted, some caramel. Roasty bitter. Coffee. Roasted bitter aftertaste. Good drinkability. Good one.

#380Bottle 0,75l. Deep brown body, minimal tan head. Very pleasant aroma of cocoa powder, toasted plums, coffee. Taste is unpleasantly harsh, toasted bitterness. Dark fruits (mainly plums), coffee, cocoa. Thin body, very soft carbonation. Without harshness in flavor it should be good one.

Bottle 0,75l. Almost black colored. AROMA- slightly sweet, licorice, chocolate, roasted malt. FLAVOR- dry, bitter, a bit harsh, licorice, roasted malt, dark chocolate. Light bodied.Light bodied stout without smoothness, somewhat harsh. Disappointing.

Bottle from Klub Malych Pivovaru, Pilsen CZ, Malt,roasted,coffee and nice dark chocolate aroma, Almost black color, smaller lacing creamy head, Sweeter taste, light bitter and dry finish, Full body, Soft carbon, Pleasant interpretation of style.
Vycap 20pip. Cierna farba, hneda husta pena. Vona krasne cokoladova, prazene slady, jemne prezreta slivka. Chut sucha, cokoladova, prazene slady. Velmi dobre pitelne pivo.
Tap at Craft Beer Pub. Very tasty stout. Typical full bodied fully malty stout. Clean roasty chocolatey coffeeish flavours, nicely balanced. Very good.
